map.string: (Hidden)
(Hidden parcel)
(Hidden region)
*** IM blocked by your viewer
Shown in place of the original message when an incoming IM is blocked
Blocked incoming IM message (local)
*** IM blocked by sender's viewer
Shown (and sent to the remote party) when an outgoing IM is blocked
Blocked outgoing IM message (local + remote)
*** The other party respectfully requests you mind your own business (bunnies made me do it!)
Sent to the remote party when you deny their request to list your active RLV restrictions)
@list and @except command (remote)
(Use @except to see the list of active exceptions)
Sent to the remote party as a suffix to @list to inform them how to request your exceptions
@list command suffix (remote)
*** The other party is not under a @startim restriction
Sent to the remote party when they attempt to forcefully close your IM conversation with them (and no such session exists)
@stopim command with no session (remote)
*** Session has been ended for the other party
Sent to the remote party when they attempt to forcefully close the IM conversation (and it exists)
@stopim command with an active session (remote)
[NAME] has remotely closed the IM conversation with @stopim
Unable to use the autopilot due to RLV restrictions
Unable to perform action due to RLV restrictions
Unable to change your active group due to an RLV restriction; switching back to "[GROUP_SLURL]"
Unable to perform the requested inventory action due to an RLV locked folder.
Unable to see the presence of nearby avatars due to RLV restrictions
Attempt to attach '[OBJECT]' was denied due to RLV restrictions
'[OBJECT]' was denied permission to teleport you due to RLV restrictions
Unable to start IM session with [RECIPIENT] due to RLV restrictions
Unable to start conference with [RECIPIENT] due to RLV restrictions
Unable to initiate teleport due to RLV restrictions
Unable to offer teleport due to RLV restrictions
Unable to open [TYPE] due to RLV restrictions
Unable to enable wireframe mode due to RLV restrictions
The Resident you messaged is currently prevented from reading your instant messages at the moment, please try again later.
Sent to the remote party when their IM was blocked
Blocked incoming IM message (remote)
The Resident is currently prevented from accepting. Please try again later.
